attributes.action: sack Alistair Darling after HM Customs & Revenue lost private data of up to 25m people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/uk_politics/7104840.stm

HM customs & revenue lost private information of upto 25m people in the UK with relation to child benefits claimaints.

The lost information includes:- National insurance number
Name, address and birth date
Partner's details
Names, sex and age of children
Bank/savings account details

This leaves upto 7.25 million families open to identity fraud.

An apology is not enough!!!
Sign this and have your say over the future of our supposedly trustworthy government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
